casebody.data:
Henry Norris WILLIAMS, et al
v.
The DOW CHEMICAL COMPANY, et al NO. 2019-CC-0563 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 16, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI, TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FIRST CIRCUIT, PARISH OF IBERVILLE PER CURIAM

Granted. Considering the unusual circumstances of this case, we find the district court's ruling was consistent with the authority granted by La. R.S. 13:3044(C) and was equitable to all parties. Accordingly, the judgment of the court of appeal is reversed, and the judgment of the district court is reinstated. The case is remanded to the district court for further proceedings.
